casebody.data:
Albert Smith Sheldon, Respondent, v. Williean S. Hudson, as Administrator, etc., of Gillias A. Hudson, Deceased, Appellant.

(3 cases.)

— Judgment and order, in each case, reversed, and new trial granted, with costs to appellant to abide event, and on the stipulation filed herein the actions are referred to, and to be tried together before, Hon. Albert F. Gladding, counselor at law, to hear, try and determine the same. All concurred; Sewell, J., not sitting.
